title: Danny & Kimberly Williams-Paisley (Father of the Bride, Author of Where The Light Gets In)
itunes:title: Danny & Kimberly Williams-Paisley (Father of the Bride, Author of Where The Light Gets In)
itunes:subtitle: Danny welcomes Queen/Icon/Legend Kimberly Williams-Paisley to Everything Iconic. They discuss her career in films like Father of the Bride, The Christmas Chronicles, her book (Where The Lights Get In), her charity work (The Store in Nashville), and mor...
description:
Danny welcomes Queen/Icon/Legend Kimberly Williams-Paisley to Everything Iconic. They discuss her career in films like Father of the Bride, The Christmas Chronicles, her book (Where The Lights Get In), her charity work (The Store in Nashville), and more!


YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/dannypellegrino1

For tickets to the Chicago live show: https://bit.ly/3bc6QLX

*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic

LINKS:
